original_text: When the other ten disciples heard about this, they were angry with the two brothers.
korean_text: 열 제자가 듣고 그 두 형제에 대하여 분히 여기거늘

sentences.original_text: When the other ten disciples heard about this
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 열 제자들이 이것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: they were angry with the two brothers
